member.name: T:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings
member.summary: The server settings.

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.EmailerServiceEmailAddress
member.summary: Service email, for info about not available service from HeatchCheck Can be used for next Develop, automatic checking problems, missing data and all other Its Necessary for Correct running Server Internal Core Monitoring

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.EmailerSMTPServerAddress
member.summary: SMTP Server Address for Login to External Mail Server Its Necessary for Correct running Server Internal Core Monitoring

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.EmailerSMTPPort
member.summary: SMTP Port for Login to External Mail Server Its Necessary for Correct running Server Internal Core Monitoring

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.EmailerSMTPSslIsEnabled
member.summary: EmailerSMTPSslIsEnabled SSl Email Protocol for Login to External Mail Server Its Necessary for Correct running Server Internal Core Monitoring

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.EmailerSMTPLoginUsername
member.summary: SMTP UserName for Login to External Mail Server Its Necessary for Correct running Server Internal Core Monitoring

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.EmailerSMTPLoginPassword
member.summary: SMTP Password for Login to External Mail Server Its Necessary for Correct running Server Internal Core Monitoring

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.DatabaseConnectionString
member.summary: Server Database Connection string for Full Service of Database Migration/Api/Check/Unlimited Develop !!!Warning: Check this connection for Read/Write/Exec is enabled In Config File Must Be Only This Paramneter

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.DatabaseInternalCachingEnabled
member.summary: Enable Disable Entity Framework Internal Cache I recommend turning it off : from Logic, Duplicit Functionality with Database Server in complex process can generate problems Recommended: false

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.DatabaseInternalCacheTimeoutMin
member.summary: Time in Minutes for Database Valid Cache Data and Refreshing Duplicit Functionality with Database Server Recommended: 30

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ConfigLogWarnPlusToDbEnabled
member.summary: Enable Logging Server Warn and Errors To Database

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ConfigCoreServerRegisteredName
member.summary: Server Service Name automatic figured in All IS/OS/Engines info Recommended: EASY-IT-CENTER

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ServiceCoreCheckerEmailSenderActive
member.summary: Activation / Deactivation of Email Sender For Server Core Fails Checker All Catch Write to SendEmail, In Debug mode is Written in console in Release mode is Sended email (All incorrect server statuses are monitored) Can be writen to Database - !!! Warning for infinite Cycling (DB shutdown example) Recommended: true

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ServiceUseDbLocalAutoupdatedDials
member.summary: Special Function: Using Selected Tables with AutoRefresh On change as Local DataSets, For Optimize Traffic. For Example LanguageList - Static table with often reading Recommended: true - functionality must be implemented in Server Code

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ServiceServerLanguage
member.summary: Server Language for Translating Server internal statuses Recommended: cz or en - other languages are not implemented

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ServiceEnableMassEmail
member.summary: Server support mass emailing as Service You can enable Mass Email Api

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ServerProviderModeEnabled
member.summary: Enabling Provider APIs More Informations are Published on WepPages Are Published Core Informations With Full Solutions Info/Tools/Codes/Etc Published

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ModuleAutoSchedulerEnabled
member.summary: Server Scheduler Module for Automatization Tasks

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ConfigServerStartupPort
member.summary: Set Server Startup Port on Http/HttpS/WebSocket and for All Engines, Modules, API Controler and WebPages Recommended: 5000

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.WebSocketTimeoutMin
member.summary: WebSocket Timeout Connection Settings in Minutes. After timeout when not detected any communication socket is closed Set according to your need Recommended: 2

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.WebSocketMaxBufferSizeKb
member.summary: Maximum socket message size for control Traffic Recomended: 10

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ConfigApiTokenTimeoutMin
member.summary: Bearer Token Timeout Setting in Minutes. Connection must be Refreshed in Interval After Timeout connection Must Login Again. It is as needed. You Can Change Key for close All connections Immediately. Timeout is good for Webpages Recomended: 15

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ConfigServerStartupOnHttps
member.summary: Setting for Server URL Services. Logically can run only one Http or Https Server has more Security Setting Politics. Recommended: true

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ConfigServerGetLetsEncrypt
member.summary: Setting for Automatic Obtain Lets Encrypt more Security Setting Politics. Recommended: true

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ConfigCertificatePath
member.summary: Certificate file NextFrom'DATA'Path\\Filename.pfx For import External Certificate Its Path from Data Startup Folder,example "groupware.pfx" is in Data Path The Password must be inserted in ConfigCertificatePassword Settings Other for ignore this Setting set empty string "" This settings has Higest Priority before LesEncrypt enabled

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ConfigCertificateDomain
member.summary: Its Domain for include to Automatic Generated Certificate For Server running on HTTPS. Domain is for Your validation Certificate Domain. Can be Changed for commercial. Domain is Used for Lets Encrypt also Write with Comma separator Recommended: 127.0.0.1

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ConfigCertificatePassword
member.summary: Password will be inserted to Server Generated Certificate for HTTPS. Recommended: empty = Maximal Security Randomly generated 20 chars string

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ConfigJwtLocalKey
member.summary: Special Functions:Server AutoGenerated encryption Key For Securing Communication On Each Server Restart All Tokens not will be valid and the Login Reconnect is Requested. Its AntiHacker Security Rule Recommended: empty = Maximal Security Randomly generated 40 chars string

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ConfigServerStartupHTTPAndHTTPS
member.summary: Startup Server On HTTP and HTTPS on Defined Port

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ConfigTimeTokenValidationEnabled
member.summary: Enable Disable Bearer Token Timeout Validation Token can be valid EveryTime to using: Example for machine connection Or is Control last activity

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ConfigManagerEmailAddress
member.summary: Emailová adresa do obchodních kontaktů

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ServerFtpEngineEnabled
member.summary: Enable FTP File Server oppened for every connection with full rights

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ServerFtpSecurityEnabled
member.summary: Enable FTP Security For access to FTP must be logged

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ServerFtpStorageRootPath
member.summary: FTP Server Storage Path Definition It Will be under wwwroot for Posibility Share Data or For WebAccess/Browser Over WebPortal

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ServerCorsAllowAnyOrigin
member.summary: CORS Hlavčky HTTP Requestů příchozích na server WEB + API, Povolit jakýkoli původ

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ServerCorsAllowAnyMethod
member.summary: CORS Hlavčky HTTP Requestů příchozích na server WEB + API, Povolit jakoukoliv Metodu

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ServerCorsAllowAnyHeader

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ServerPublicUrl
member.summary: Veřejná URL adresa serveru použita v modulech

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ServerCorsEnabled
member.summary: Server Filtrování Dle CORS Zapnuto

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ModuleSwaggerApiDocEnabled
member.summary: Special Function: Server Automatically Generate Full Documentation of API structure AND Database Model. Plus Included API Interface for Online Testing All API Methods with Authentication Its Automatic Solution for Third Party cooperation. All changes are Reflected after restart server

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ModuleHealthServiceEnabled
member.summary: Special Function: More than 200 Server Statuses Can be monitored by HeathCheckService, Over Net can Control Other Company Services Also as Central Control Point With Email Service. For Example: Server/Memory/All DB Types/IP/HDD/Port/Api/NET/Cloud/Environment Must be run for Metrics AddOn https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/architecture/microservices/implement-resilient-applications/monitor-app-health

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ModuleHealthServiceRefreshIntervalSec
member.summary: Special Function: More than 200 Server Statuses Can be monitored by HeathCheckService, Over Net can Control Other Company Services Also as Central Control Point With Email Service. For Example: Server/Memory/All DB Types/IP/HDD/Port/Api/NET/Cloud/Environment Must be run for Metrics AddOn !!! run in Release mode for Good Reading of Logs without HeathChecks Cycling info https://github.com/Xabaril/AspNetCore.Diagnostics.HealthChecks https://testfully.io/blog/api-health-check-monitoring/

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ModuleMdDocumentationEnabled
member.summary: Enable Server Structure Documentation for Developers Using RootPath, - Block File Browsing Is Good for Server with Documentation only Or Use for Show WebPage and Copy "Only HTML"

member.name: P:UbytkacBackend.ServerCoreStructure.ServerConfigSettings.ModuleDbDiagramGeneratorEnabled
member.summary: Enable Automatic Database Diagram for Simple show Database structure with All bingings
